column1: Little Goat Diner////Went to city for a quick trip & came here for lunch! Had reservations of course so we didn't have to wait. We ordered the maple bacon shake with bourbon in it (must try)
column3: pork belly with asian slaw (our fave)
column4: & bulls eye french toast! I know there are many other things on the menu but I've had them all and I just keep coming back to order our favorites!
